name: Lone Star Helicopters LLC
about: Lone Star Helicopters LLC, based in Lago Vista, Texas, offers comprehensive helicopter flight training and brokerage services. We provide one-on-one training for various certifications, including Initial Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Certified Flight Instructor. Our programs are tailored to let students advance at their own pace and include specialized training in Robinson R22, R44, R66, Bell 206 series, and Schweizer 300 aircraft. As a Schweizer RSG Factory Pilot Training and Aircraft Demo Facility, we ensure high-quality instruction and real-world training experiences. Our team, led by experienced professionals, is dedicated to providing personalized and flexible training to meet the needs of our students. We highly recommend the Helicopter Online Ground School (HOGS) to enhance our students' learning experience. At Lone Star Helicopters, we are committed to helping our students achieve their aviation goals with excellence and safety.
